sentences.english: And lofting with polar coordinates method can break through localization of deflection angle method.
sentences.chinese: 使用極座標法放樣可以避免偏角法的侷限性。

sentences.english: And finally, the magnetic corrected (values) of characteristic areas of the sea waters in China is presented.
sentences.chinese: 同時，也給出了中國各海域代表性地區磁偏角改正值。

sentences.english: This paper studies a new guidance law based on the relative velocity deflection angle.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了一種基於相對速度偏角的導引律。
